body_html:
I didn't quite follow what you meant by "I have no problem on writing under my path". Could you elaborate on that?

But regardless, it seems like the fopen call here that is failing, so it does seem to be the filesystem rejecting the open call. So perhaps there are some ulimits in place?
body_text:
I didn't quite follow what you meant by "I have no problem on writing under my path". Could you elaborate on that?
But regardless, it seems like the fopen call here that is failing, so it does seem to be the filesystem rejecting the open call. So perhaps there are some ulimits in place?
body:
I didn't quite follow what you meant by "I have no problem on writing under my path". Could you elaborate on that?

But regardless, it seems like the `fopen` call [here](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.2/tensorflow/core/platform/posix/posix_file_system.cc#L150) that is failing, so it does seem to be the filesystem rejecting the open call. So perhaps there are some `ulimits` in place?
